actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To exempt certain entries of titanium disks from anti-dumping duties retroactively applied by the United States Customs Service.

summary.text: Directs the U.S. Customs Service to: (1) liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of titanium disks as exempt from antidumping duties (case number A- 462-103); and (2) refund such duties if the importer of such entries files a request with the Customs Service within 90 days of their liquidation or reliquidation.

titles.title: To exempt certain entries of titanium disks from anti-dumping duties retroactively applied by the United States Customs Service.
